kw.name: Open Application
kw.arg: appium:deviceName=Samsung Galaxy S9 FHD GoogleAPI Emulator
kw.doc: Opens a new application to given Appium server. Capabilities of appium server, Android and iOS, Please check https://appium.io/docs/en/2.1/cli/args/ | *Option* | *Man.* | *Description* | | remote_url | Yes | Appium server url | | alias | no | alias | | strict_ssl | No | allows you to send commands to an invalid certificate host like a self-signed one. |

kw.name: Go To Url
kw.doc: Opens URL in default web browser.

kw.name: Get Contexts
kw.doc: Get available contexts.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Switch To Context
kw.doc: Switch to a new context

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` appears on current page.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click element identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Switch To Context
kw.doc: Switch to a new context

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click element identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.msg: xpath criteria: //h3[contains(text(),'Dupla de Orquídeas Amarelas para Presente')]
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` appears on current page.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.msg: Verifying element 'xpath=//h3[contains(text(),'Dupla de Orquídeas Amarelas para Presente')]' contains exactly text 'Dupla de Orquídeas Amarelas para Presente'.
xpath criteria: //h3[contains(text(),'Dupla de Orquídeas Amarelas para Presente')]
kw.arg: Dupla de Orquídeas Amarelas para Presente
kw.doc: Verifies element identified by ``locator`` exactly contains text ``expected``.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.msg: Verifying element 'css=div.container_full:nth-child(11) main.content-site:nth-child(8) main.main:nth-child(3) section.product-container:nth-child(3) div.product-container-left main.slider.content-left div.carousel-position-left.banner-product.owl-carousel.owl-theme div.owl-wrapper-outer div.owl-wrapper div.owl-item:nth-child(1) div.product-item a.list-carousel div.price > span.actual-price' contains exactly text 'R$ 199,90'.
kw.doc: Verifies element identified by ``locator`` exactly contains text ``expected``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` appears on current page.
